item.title: P.M. add a quote by P.M. Russell
item.description: "As a kid I was told to quit daydreaming! Don't you want to be a success like Joe, who always listens? Now, I'm an adult and Joe is in jail and I'm writing books, go figure." -- P.M. Russell

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Les Brown
item.description: "Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears." -- Les Brown

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Les Brown
item.description: "Life has no limitations, except the ones you make." -- Les Brown

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Michelangelo Buonarroti
item.description: "The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark." -- Michelangelo Buonarroti

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "If you treat an individual as he is, he will remain how he is. But if you treat him as if he were what he ought to be and could be, he will become what he ought to be and could be." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "A man should hear a little music, read a little poetry, and see a fine picture every day of his life, in order that worldly cares may not obliterate the sense of the beautiful which God has implanted in the human soul." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Denis Waitley
item.description: "The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence." -- Denis Waitley

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "We're all going to die, all of us, what a circus! That alone should make us love each other but it doesn't. We are terrorized and flattened by trivialities, we are eaten up by nothing." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "You have to die a few times before you can really live." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "what matters most is how well you walk through the fire" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "An intellectual says a simple thing in a hard way. An artist says a hard thing in a simple way." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: P.M. add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "There are no happy endings. Endings are the saddest part, So just give me a happy middle And a very happy start." -- Shel Silverstein
